column1: Food Tourism Entrepreneurship Program Postgraduate H417  George Brown College2023.json
column13: Experiential Learning in the format of field trips, guest speakers and industry events are explored in semesters 1 and 2. The third semester is devoted to research and work placement. Collaborations with industry members will be explored to identify opportunities for applied research and work-integrated learning.
